https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/mx9O6dEfOzFn4KDmFnQP3G2Eq9K.jpg Advent is a sequel to Alien: Covenant in which David sends a transmission from the Covenant to Weyland-Yutani on Earth, elaborating upon the genetic experimentation he has been conducting on Planet 4.
